intro.title: A Shadow over Brinmere
intro.desc: You awake on the damp shore of Brinmere, the moon a thin silver crescent. A ruined watchtower smolders a short distance inland, and a narrow path leads towards a cluster of cottages to the east. In the water beside you lies a small, carved wooden box, half-buried in sand.

inspect_box.desc: Inspect the carved wooden box at the water's edge.

approach_tower.desc: Head inland towards the smoldering watchtower.

walk_to_cottages.desc: Follow the path east towards the cottages.

box.title: The Box
box.desc: The box is warm despite the night air. Inside is a folded scrap of parchment with a hatch-marked map and the words: 'Beneath the tower, the latch sings.' As you read, a faint whisper seems to come from the tower, as if the wind itself speaks your name.

take_map.desc: Take the map and keep it.

effects.add_journal: Found map fragment: 'Beneath the tower, the latch sings.'

leave_box.desc: Leave the box where it is.

tower.title: The Watchtower
tower.desc: The watchtower's stonework is cracked and warm embers glow within. An iron latch covers a hatch at the base — it looks old but recently used. You can try the latch, look for other entrances, or retreat.

try_latch_without_map.desc: Try the iron latch without any clue.

search_around.desc: Search the nearby rubble for another entrance.

tower_approach.title: Toward the Tower
tower_approach.desc: Clutching the map, you approach the watchtower. The map's marks align with the hatch at the base, and you notice a faint singing resonance when you step close.

open_hatch.desc: Use the map clue and try the hatch latch carefully.

effects.add_journal: Used map clue to open the hatch.

latch_fail.title: A Bad Twist
latch_fail.desc: You twist the latch without heed — the mechanism sticks, and the effort sends a shiver through the ground. From inside the tower, something rustles in alarm.

stand_ground.desc: Stand and prepare for whatever emerges.

latch_open.title: The Hatch Opens
latch_open.desc: With the map's guidance the latch yields and the hatch opens with a breath of cold air. Inside, a spiral of rough steps leads down into an ancient cellar lit by phosphorescent moss.

secret_entrance.title: A Narrow Gap
secret_entrance.desc: Behind a pile of rubble you find a narrow gap and old rope leading downward. It smells of cold iron and something briny.

squeeze_in.desc: Squeeze through the gap and follow the rope down.

mark_and_return.desc: Mark the spot and return to the shore.

cellar.title: Cellar of Echoes
cellar.desc: The cellar opens into a circular chamber where runes glow faintly. At the center is a stone plinth and upon it a small brass key and a sealed scroll.

open_scroll.desc: Break the seal and read the scroll.

effects.add_journal: Scroll reads: 'The tide remembers what the villagers forget.'

leave_quietly.desc: Leave the cellar and close the hatch behind you.

cellar_key.title: Key in Hand
cellar_key.desc: With the key in your hand the runes dim and a hidden panel slides open, revealing a small statue that begins to hum. A voice, ancient and kind, asks: 'Will you return what was taken?'

pledge_help.desc: Pledge to return what was taken.

effects.add_journal: You pledged to return what was taken.
You pocketed the key; a weight grows in your pocket.

scroll_reveal.title: The Scroll
scroll_reveal.desc: The scroll tells of an heirloom taken by a water spirit that dwells beneath the tower. It hints that the brass key 'speaks' when offered with truth.

search_for_key.desc: Search the plinth for a key.

leave_quietly.desc: Leave the cellar and keep the knowledge to yourself.

tower_combat.title: Something Emerges
tower_combat.desc: A hunched, brine-soaked creature scrambles out from the tower. Its eyes glow with hunger. You must act quickly.

fight_win.title: After the Scuffle
fight_win.desc: You manage to fend off the creature; it flees wailing towards the sea. On the ground lies a small locket engraved with a crest — likely the heirloom mentioned in the scroll.

take_locket.desc: Take the locket and examine it.

leave_locket.desc: Leave the locket and tend to your wounds.

reward.title: A Minor Resolution
reward.desc: A small sense of peace settles over Brinmere. Villagers may one day know the heirloom is found, or it may remain a secret. You feel the night shift; the little arc of your story here closes for now.

end_session.desc: End the session and return to the shore (conclude mini-arc).

cursed_key.title: A Weight in the Pocket
cursed_key.desc: The brass key glows coldly. You feel a heavy sorrow that tugs at your thoughts. Perhaps the key demands something in return...

seek_redemption.desc: Seek a way to make amends.

bury_key.desc: Bury the key and hope the weight fades.
